00026 #include "OgreLog.h"
00027 
00028 namespace Ogre {
00029 
00030     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00031     Log::Log( const String& name, bool debuggerOuput )
00032     {
00033         mfpLog.open(name);
00034         mDebugOut = debuggerOuput;
00035         mLogLevel = LL_NORMAL;
00036     }
00037     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     Log::~Log()
00039     {
00040         mfpLog.close();
00041     }
00042     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00043     void Log::logMessage( const String& message, LogMessageLevel lml )
00044     {
00045         if ((mLogLevel + lml) >= LOG_THRESHOLD)
00046         {
00047             if (mDebugOut)
00048                 fprintf( stderr, "%s\n", message.c_str());
00049 
00050             // Write time into log
00051            struct tm *pTime;
00052            time_t ctTime; time(&ctTime);
00053            pTime = gmtime( &ctTime );
00054             mfpLog << pTime->tm_hour << ":" << pTime->tm_min << ":" << pTime->tm_sec << ": " << message << std::endl;
00055 
00056             // Flush stcmdream to ensure it is written (incase of a crash, we need log to be up to date)
00057             mfpLog.flush();
00058         }
00059 
00060     }
00061     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00062     void Log::setLogDetail(LoggingLevel ll)
00063     {
00064         mLogLevel = ll;
00065     }
00066 }
